Package net.kanjitomo

Class Column

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kanjitomo.Column
  • public class Column
extends java.lang.Object
    List of areas inside a single column (or row in horizontal orientation)

        public java.util.List<java.awt.Rectangle> areas
